{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.1","title":"Implement Particle class with analytic evolution","description":"Create Particle dataclass in src/core/particle.py with:
- Properties: index, type (FREE/HARMONIC), mass, position, velocity, equilibrium_pos, spring_constant
- Methods: evolve_free(), evolve_harmonic(), time_to_collision(), kinetic_energy(), potential_energy()
- Use exact analytic solutions for harmonic oscillators","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:24:55Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:24:55Z"}

{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.4","title":"Add unit tests for particle evolution","description":"Create tests/test_particle.py with:
- test_free_particle_evolution: verify ballistic motion
- test_harmonic_particle_evolution: verify oscillation against analytic solution
- test_harmonic_energy_conservation: |ΔE/E| < 10^-10
- test_collision_time_prediction: accuracy checks","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:14Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:14Z"}

{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.2","title":"Implement Chain configuration and container","description":"Create Chain class in src/core/chain.py with:
- ChainConfig dataclass for initialization parameters
- Alternating particle type initialization
- Boundary condition modes (OPEN, PERIODIC)
- Methods: total_energy(), total_momentum(), local_temperature(), get_neighbors()
- Support for thermal and custom initial conditions","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:02Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:02Z"}

{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.3","title":"Implement collision detection and resolution","description":"Create collision engine in src/core/collision.py with:
- CollisionEvent dataclass (time, particle indices, type)
- CollisionDetector class with priority queue (heapq)
- find_next_collision() method scanning all pairs
- resolve_collision() for elastic collisions (momentum/energy conservation)
- Event queue update after collisions","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:08Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:08Z"}

{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.5","title":"Add unit tests for collision mechanics","description":"Create tests/test_collision.py with:
- test_elastic_collision_momentum_conservation
- test_elastic_collision_energy_conservation
- test_collision_detection_accuracy
- test_event_queue_ordering
- Property-based tests using Hypothesis for arbitrary masses/velocities","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:19Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:19Z"}

{"id":"ding-a-ling-t4v.6","title":"Verify energy conservation in full system","description":"Create integration test in tests/test_integration.py:
- test_closed_system_energy_conservation: run N=100 chain with periodic BC for 10^6 collisions
- Verify |ΔE/E| < 10^-10 throughout simulation
- Test with various epsilon values (0.5, 1.0, 2.0)
- Benchmark performance on M2 Pro","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"mimnagh@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:26Z","created_by":"mimnagh","updated_at":"2026-02-15T16:25:26Z"}
